publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-425# Tavish Scott: Exemption from Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes the Chancellor of the Exchequer’s consultation exercise on the possible introduction of an exemption from Air Passenger Duty for flights from the Highlands and Islands; further notes that air services within the Highlands and Islands provide lifeline links, particularly for those needing medical services on the Scottish mainland, and supports an exemption for all flights from Orkney, Shetland and the Western Isles to other Highlands and Islands and Scottish airports. Supported by: George Lyon*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr John Munro*
S1M-425# Exemption from Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 14 January 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-425# Exemption from Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 14 January 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-425# Exemption from Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 14 January 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mary Scanlon*

S1M-425# Tavish Scott: Exemption from Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes the Chancellor of the Exchequer’s consultation exercise on the possible introduction of an exemption from Air Passenger Duty for flights from the Highlands and Islands; further notes that air services within the Highlands and Islands provide lifeline links, particularly for those needing medical services on the Scottish mainland, and supports an exemption for all flights from Orkney, Shetland and the Western Isles to other Highlands and Islands and Scottish airports. Supported by: George Lyon, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr John Munro, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mary Scanlon
S1M-425# Exemption from Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 14 January 2000) Shona Robison*, Alex Neil*

Supported by: George Lyon, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr John Munro, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mary Scanlon, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Mrs Margaret Smith*

Supported by: George Lyon, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr John Munro, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mary Scanlon, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Mrs Margaret Smith, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr David Davidson, Alasdair Morgan*
